title: Buns
creator_credit: Thomas Bammel, Depicture Company and Oxford Films (U.S.)
brief_description: Shows a large factory complete with automation and assembly line, producing hamburger buns. Covers each detail of this production from the giant kneader handling hundreds of pounds of dough to the automatic packaging and shipping. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
